Production Design Tool Repo

Use these tools to increase the acceptance rate and usability of your Stock Templates.
Make sure each submission follows the Production specs for your files to go online faster!

Action Library

Automate your design files to meet best practices: check here for helpful actions and scripts to run to help your files best meet the Photoshop, Illustrator and https://spark.adobe.com/page/i6FkYl2XCaScI/Indesign Template specs.

Metadata

Metadata is a crucial part of any work you'd like to show the world. We've made it easy for you! Just fill out this form (for each Template) and include the downloaded CSV in each submitted Batch of work.
